summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 23, Bell and Denny's 1st Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue and 2nd Avenue, from Wall Street to Vine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9881 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
